/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, their colors muted under the sunlight. Cars are parked along the sides of the road, adding to the urban atmosphere. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings, which gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
